The post Elizabeth Olsen Age | Height | Weight | Boyfriends | Biography | Wiki appeared first on Bollywikia.

]]> Elizabeth Olsen young talented and beautiful American actress. After huge success in Marvel movies, her fans start calling her as Wanda Maximoff or Scarlet Witch, who is a fictional character. Her breakthrough came in 2011 when she starred in the independent thriller drama Martha Marcy May Marlene, for which she was nominated and received many awards.

Biography & Wiki

Elizabeth Olsen’s Born Name is Elizabeth Chase Olsen. Also, her nicknames are C Head, Lizzie Olsen, Liz, Lizzie. She was born on 16 February 1989 in Los Angeles, California, US in an Atheism family. Hence, her current age is 31 years. Elizabeth’s Zodiac is Aquarius.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Elizabeth Olsen’s father’s name is David Olsen who is a real estate developer and mortgage banker. Her mother’s name is Jarnette Olsen who is a personal manager. She has twin sisters named Mary-Kate Olsen and Ashley Olsen. She has a brother named Trent Olsen who is also an actor. In 1996, Elizabeth’s parents divorced. She also has two younger half-siblings named Courtney Taylor Olsen, Jake Olsen.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

There was a rumor that Elizabeth Olsen had a fling with an American actor Alexander Skarsgård in February 2012. Then, she dating fellow American model and actor Boyd Holbrook from 2012 to 2015. The couple even got engaged in March 2014 but called off their wedding during the course of the year. She was also rumored to have dated Avengers: Age of Ultron actor Chris Evans.

In May 2015, Olsen was rumored to have had a relationship with her co-star, Tom Hiddleston, after they worked together in the film, I Saw the Light. She announced her engagement to indie musician Robbie Arnett on July 30, 2019.

Education and School, College

Elizabeth did her schooling from Hall School in North Hollywood, California. After that, she joined New York University’s Tisch School of the Arts. She graduated in March 2013. After that, she joined the Atlantic Theater Company in Manhattan, NYC. She spent one semester in the Art Theatre School, Moscow, Russia through the MATS program at the Eugene O’Neill Theater Center.

Favorites Things and Like & Dislike

Elizabeth Olsen career

As a child, Elizabeth received ballet and singing lessons. Elizabeth Olsen began acting at a very young age, with appearances in her sisters’ films. Before the age of 11, she had landed small roles in How the West Was Fun, Our First Video and the straight-to-video series The Adventures of Mary-Kate and Ashley. Finally, in
2011 she debuts in Hollywood with Martha Marcy May Marlene. She won many awards for her role in this movie. After that, Elizabeth Olsen starred in Legendary’s Godzilla a reboot, opposite Bryan Cranston and Aaron Taylor-Johnson.

Then she joined Marvel Cinematic Universe by playing the role of Scarlet Witch in 2015. She worked with man Marvel movies like Avengers: Age of Ultron, Captain America: Civil War, Avengers: Infinity War, Avengers: Endgame. She will appear in the WandaVision web television series in Disney+ as a part of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

She appeared in print ads for Miu Miu’s Spring / Summer 2014 campaign.

Awards and recognition

  • Alliance of Women Film Journalists Best Breakthrough Performance for Martha Marcy May Marlene in 2011.
  • Chicago Film Critics Association Most Promising Performer for Martha Marcy May Marlene in 2011.
  • Florida Film Critics Circle Pauline Kael Breakout Award for Martha Marcy May Marlene in 2011.
  • Ghent International Film Festival Special Mention for Martha Marcy May Marlene in 2011.
  • Los Angeles Film Critics Association New Generation Award for Martha Marcy May Marlene in 2011.
  • Vancouver Film Critics Circle Best Actress for Martha Marcy May Marlene in 2011.
  • Fangoria Chainsaw Awards Best Leading Actress Silent House Won for I Saw the Light in 2013.
  • Deauville American Film Festival Hollywood Rising Star Award for I Saw the Light in 2015.

Salary and Net Worth

Elizabeth Olsen’s current net worth is $9 million. She received $2.5 million for her role as Scarlet Witch as salary.

Contact Address

Controversies

There was a controversy when she said “I’m the only one with a cleavage” compare to other Marvel characters in movie promotion.

Facts about Elizabeth Olsen

  • Elizabeth and her older brothers, Elizabeth and James, have a clothing line named after him. It was started by Elizabeth’s sister.
  • She was nominated for 3 awards for the 2011 film Martha Marcy May Marlene.
  • She has not starred in the film Spy Kids but has auditioned for it in the past.
  • Elizabeth began his acting career at the age of 4.
  • Olsen was at # 94 among AskMen’s Most Desirable Women of 2012.
  • Elizabeth likes to play volleyball.
  • She is the youngest and tallest among her three sisters.
  • Elizabeth drives a used Range Rover inherited from her older sister, Mary-Kate, in 2004.
  • She is often considered a more intense actor than her older sisters and takes on more serious characters to play.
  • Olsen gave the Audition for the role of Daenerys Targaryen Game of Thrones (2011) which eventually went to Emilia Clarke.

Social Media

The post Aishwarya Rai Height | Age | Husband | Family | Biography | Wiki appeared first on Bollywikia.

]]> Aishwarya Rai is an Indian actress and model. She is the winner of the Miss World 1994 pageant. In 2003, she became the 2nd Indian actress (1st was Parveen Babi) to appear on the cover page of the TIME magazine.

Biography & Wiki

Aishwarya Rai’s nicknames are Ash and Gullu. She was born on 1 November 1973 in Mangalore, Karnataka, India in a Hindu family. Hence, her current age is 46 years. Aishwarya’s Zodiac is Scorpio.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Aishwarya Rai’s father’s name is Krishnaraj Rai who was working on the Army as a biologist. Her mother’s name is Vrinda Rai and she is a Homemaker. She has a brother named Aditya Rai who is working in the merchant navy as an Engineer. Furthermore, she is the daughter in law of legendary Bollywood actor Amitabh Bachchan and veteran actress Jaya Bachchan. She has a sweet daughter named Aradhya Bachchan.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

There was a rumor that Aishwarya Rai dated Rajeev Mulchandani on the initial day of her carrier. She was in a serious relationship with Salman Khan. They were in a relationship from 1999 to 2001. After her break-up, she said that she faced abuse (verbal, physical and emotional) from Salman Khan.

There was a buzz that she was in a relationship with Vivek Oberoi after her break up with Salman. Once, Salman had apparently called Vivek ’41 times’ in one night only and threatened to kill him. To which, Vivek called a press conference at his residence and told the media about the whole conversation.

Finally, she falls in love with Abhishek Bachchan. She is one of the most beautiful women in the country and he is the son of the most reputed and respected Man in Bollywood. Some say that the sparks of love ignited between the two while shooting for the item song, Kajra Re, on the sets of Bunty Aur Babli. Finally, the couple married on 20 April 2007.

Marriage of Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan

Her lavish wedding in 2007 cost around 6 crores (INR), where she wore a 53-carat solitaire engagement ring worth 50 lakh (INR) and received around 15 kg of gold. Aishwarya Rai Abhishek Bachchan wedding in 2007

Education and School, College

Aishwarya Raidid her schooling from Arya Vidya Mandir, Mumbai. After that, she completed her intermediate schooling from Jai Hind College, Mumbai. Then she joined D. G. Ruparel College of Arts, Science and Commerce, Mumbai and securing 90 percent in the HSC exams. She was a bright student and consistently used to score above 90%.

Favorites Things and Like & Dislike

Aishwarya Rai career

During her 12th standard, Aishwarya’s English professor asked her to do a photo shoot for a fashion magazine, as she was also a photojournalist. After doing it, she started getting modeling offers but she refused them as she wanted to concentrate on her studies. But, after her 12th exams, the glamour world attracted her and she did modeling for a lark. At the age of 18, she won an international supermodel contest that was organized by Ford Motor Company.

Aishwarya was the hot favorite to win the 1994 Miss India title, but she lost it to Sushmita Sen, mainly due to her lack of public speaking skills. The same year, she won the Miss World title on 19 November 1994 in South Africa. During the Miss World title days in South Africa, all the 82 contestants and the organizers gave her a big surprise birthday bash by singing ‘Happy Birthday’ in their respective languages. After winning that pageant, she received lots of offers from the Indian film industry.

Filmography

Before becoming famous, she tried her luck in voice-dubbing for a TV serial but was rejected. In 1993, she came into limelight with her Pepsi commercial alongside Aamir Khan and Mahima Chaudhry. She is the only actress to have featured for both Pepsi and Coca Cola. Finally, she debuted in a Tamil movie named Iruvar in 1997. She debuted in Bollywood in Aur Pyaar Ho Gaya, in which she played the lead role of Ashi Kailashnath, opposite Bobby Deol.

After that, Aishwarya acted in numerous Bollywood hit films like Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam (1999), Taal (1999), Mohabbatein (2000), Devdas (2002), Dhoom 2 (2006), Jodhaa Akbar (2008), Guzaarish (2010), etc. After film Guzaarish (2010), she took a break for five years from the film industry and then came back in 2015 with the Sanjay Gupta’s film Jazbaa.

She was offered the role of Breseis in the film Troy (2004), but she turned down the offer. She debuted in Hollywood in 2009 Harald Zwart-directed spy comedy The Pink Panther 2. Starring alongside Steve Martin, Jean Reno, and Emily Mortimer

Awards and recognition

  • In 2009 She was honored with the Padma Shri by the Government of India.
  • She received Ordre des Arts et des Lettres by the Government of France in 2012.
  • Aishwarya Rai Bachchan was the first Indian actress to be a jury member at the Cannes Film Festival.
  • She won 2 Best Actress awards at Filmfare for Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam (1999) and Devdas (2002).

Salary and Net Worth

Aishwarya Rai’s current net worth is $35 million. She is taking ₹9-10 crore per movie as a salary.

Contact Address

Aishwarya has many houses in multiple locations in the world.

Controversies

  • In 1996, she sued the Star and Style magazine for an amount of $20 million (2 crore INR) for publishing that actress Raveena Tandon had caught her and Akshay Kumar in a compromising position at the poolside of a 5-star hotel.
  • After the casting couch sting operation of Shakti Kapoor in 2005, he said that Aishwarya had traded sexual favors for a spot in Subhash Ghai’s movies. But, later he apologized for his words and considered it as a result of his anger.

Facts about Aishwarya Rai

  • Aishwarya did her 1st ad commercial for Camlin pencils when she was in the 9th standard.
  • If not an actress, she would have either been an architect or in medicine line as she always liked Zoology.
  • Julia Roberts once said that “Aishwarya Rai is the most beautiful woman in the world.”
  • She is a trained classical dancer.
  • During the making of the song Dola Re Dola from the film Devdas (2002), she suffered from ear bleeding due to heavy earrings.
  • After the success of the film Devdas (2002), Mattel released a limited edition of ‘Aishwarya Rai Barbie dolls’ in the United Kingdom.
  • During the shooting of her film Khakee (2004), she had an accident due to the out of control car of the stuntman, after which she suffered severe cuts.
  • In 2004, she became the 1st Indian actress to have her wax statue at London’s Madame Tussauds museum.
  • She founded the Aishwarya Rai Foundation in 2004 to support needy people in India.
  • She was initially signed to play the role of Simmi in the film Bluffmaster (2005) but was later replaced by Priyanka Chopra without any notice. After the film was made, Rohan Sippy, the director of the film added a ‘Special thanks” message for her in the end credits as an apology.
  • A variety of Tulip flowers in the Netherlands is named Aishwarya Rai.
  • She and her family own a production company, Target Films.
  • She has been supporting the Eye Bank Association of India (EBAI), PETA India, Polio Campaign.
  • In 2009, she became the 1st Indian and South Asian actress to appear in the famous Oprah Winfrey Show.
  • Her daughter Aaradhya is popularly known as Beti B.
  • She is a good friend of Preity Zinta and Twinkle Khanna.
  • She has Katsaridaphobia, i.e. fear of cockroaches.

]]> Divya Khosla Kumar is an Indian film Actress, Producer, and Director. Divya was born in a middle-class family in Delhi. She moved to Mumbai to pursue her career. Finally, she made her debut in Tollywood film “Love Today” in 2004. Also, she made her debut in the Hindi film industry with Ab Tumhare Hawale Watan Saathiyo.

Biography & Wiki

Divya Khosla’s nickname is Sitara. She was born on 27 November 1981 in Delhi, India in a Hindu family. Hence, her current age is 38 years. Divya’s Zodiac is Sagittarius.

Divya Khosla Family Members

Divya Khosla’s father is a businessman. Her mother’s name is Not Known and she was a teacher.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Divya Khosla Kumar married to Bhushan Kumar in 2005. Bhushan Kumar is the son of Late Gulshan Kumar who is the founder of T-Series. They married in Maa Vaishno Devi shrine, Katra. The couple has a son, named Ruhaan.

Education and School, College

Divya school and collage details are not available in the current moment. She has completed her honors in Bachelor of Commerce.

The post Britney Spears Age | Height | Weight | Husband | Kids | Biography | Wiki appeared first on Bollywikia.

]]> Britney Spears is an American recording artist, singer, dancer, actress, and entertainer. She began performing as a child, landing acting roles in stage productions and television shows. In the late 1990s, Britney Spears becomes the ultimate pop princess ushering a new era of music for the entire generation. Britney adopted more mature and provocative themes for her next two studio albums, Britney (2001) and In the Zone (2003), and made her feature film debut in a starring role in Crossroads (2002).

Biography & Wiki

Britney Spears’s full name is Britney Jean Spears. She was born on 2 December 1981 in Mississippi, US. in a Christian family. Hence, her current age is 38 years. Britney’s Zodiac is Sagittarius.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Britney’s father is Jamie Spears who is Conservator. Her mother’s name is Lynne Spears who is an Engish-American author. She has an elder brother Bryan James Spears whos is an American T.V. & film producer. Britney has one younger sister named Jamie Lynn Spears who is also an Actress & singer-songwriter. She has two sons Preston Federline and Jayden Federline.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Britney Spears has many boyfriends. In high school, she dated Reg Jones. In the early 90’s she dated Justin Timberlake.

There was a rumor that Britney’s romance with her choreographer, Wade Robson. Because of that she and Timberlake broke up. There was a buzz that Britney had a brief fling with musician Fred Durst. There was also a rumor in media that, she was romantically linked to Colin Farrell in 2003 after attending a movie premiere with him. In the summer of 2003, things got romantic between Britney and Columbus Short. She also dated Jared Leto in 2003.

Britney married Jason Alexander. But the couple divorced in just 55 hours.

After that, she began dating music producer J. R. Rotem. After Britney’s infamous breakdown, she entered rehab in February 2007. While at a Promises rehab center in Malibu, California, she met musician Howie Day. The two reportedly started dating.

She also dated Criss Angel after MTV Video Music Awards performance. Britney dated with Adnan Ghalib in 2007. After that, she went to a long term relationship with her former manager, Jason Trawick. Soon after she started dating David Lucado. She had a relationship with Charlie Ebersol for eight months. Currently, she is in a relationship with Sam Asghari.

Education and School, College

Britney enrolling her at the Professional Performing Arts School. She also enrolled at McComb’s Parklane Academy.

Favorites Things and Like & Dislike

Britney Spears career

In 1991, a young Britney Spears lost on Star Search. Instead, a 12-year-old named Marty Thomas won on the episode. At the age of nine years, she was already an accomplished Gymnast. She went on to have a singing career of his own but didn’t exactly become a household name like his ’90s competitor. When she first auditioned at age 8, producers thought she was too young for the show. So, she enrolled in the Professional Performing Arts School and got some acting experience. Then, four years later, she was cast on The Mickey Mouse Club with her first love Justin Timberlake.

Before Britney signed to a record label, she was in talks to join a girl group called Innosense. But instead of sticking with that route, she pitched solo demos and ended up being signed to Jive Records in 1997. Innosense later opened for Britney on tour then the band broke up in 2002.

That’s right — “Hit Me Baby One More Time” and the like were recorded in Stockholm at Cheiron Studios. Britney flew there in the spring of 1998 and worked with famous producers like Max Martin and Denniz Pop on her first album. Britney made a big splash on the charts when …Baby One More Time hit shelves (remember, this was 1999). The record went on to sell over 10 million copies in a year and was the biggest selling album ever by a teenage artist. It’s also one of the best-selling albums all the time and the best-selling first album by any artist ever. Not too shabby.

She was the world’s most powerful celebrity in 2002

According to Forbes, at least. She came in first on their annual Celebrity 100 list that year after pulling in $39.2 million that year and being featured in over 25,000 news items. Coming in second that year? Tiger Woods. How times have changed. Britney Spears did go down in the books as the Most Searched Person of both 2007 and 2009.

The blonde was a restaurateur, briefly, at least. She opened an NYC eatery called Nyla in June 2002 but by November of that year, she cut her ties. The Cajun restaurant was a partnership with famed chef Bobby Ochs and the name came from the abbreviations for New York and Louisiana.

She’s been nominated 8 times, but only has one trophy. Her moment to shine came in 2005 when she was awarded Best Dance Recording for “Toxic.” She was pregnant with her first son at the time of the win and wasn’t there to take the stage at the big show.

Music videos are dangerous, especially when you’re Britney Spears. The star injured her left knee while shooting the video for “Outrageous” in June 2004 and she had to undergo surgery. Because of the long rehabilitation, she was forced to cancel The Onyx Hotel Tour. Luckily, Kevin Federline was around to nurse her back to health. The video was never released.

The year was 2006 and the show was Will & Grace. Britney played a closeted lesbian named Amber Louise for the “Buy, Buy Baby” episode of the hit comedy.

Awards & Recognitions

Britney’s musical success can be celebrated over six MTV Music Awards, nine Billboard Music Awards and one Grammy Award for Best Dance Recording for “Toxic” in 2005.

Paid $15 million to appear on ‘X-Factor’, Britney has been the highest-paid judge for a reality show.

Salary and Net Worth

Britney Spears earns almost $34 million from her various endeavors. Her estimated net worth of almost $215 million.

Contact Address

Britney purchased Thousand Oaks, California (CA), US. This 20.98 Acre estate in 2015 for $7.4M. The main house is 13,264 Sq. Ft, and has 5 bedrooms and 7.5 bathrooms. She also has a house in Los Angeles.

Controversies

  • Madonna kissed both Britney Spears and Christina Aguilera at the end of their 2003 MTV Music Awards, which got the show more popular than the event itself.
  • She started dating Kevin Federline when his then present girlfriend Shar Jackson was already pregnant with Kevin’s baby.
  • Britney Spears accidentally swore and screamed at the crew, right before a show and without being aware of the fact that her Mic was on!
  • Britney went through a rough patch in her life after her divorce with Kevin Federline in 2007 as well as her aunt’s death. She lost custody of her kids for being AWOL in the court trials. She went bald and also attacked the Paparazzi with an umbrella!
  • Britney and J. Timberlake brought each other toilet seats (costing $21000) with their own faces on them.
  • She turned down proposals for the songs ‘Telephone’ and ‘Umbrella’ (That Rihanna rocked!).
  • Jason Alexander and Spears were married for a total of about 55 hours! The marriage that created history for being the Shortest Marriage was annulled thereafter.
  • She was dropped by PETA from the position of a substantial spokesperson because she used a python and a caged tiger in her MTV Video Awards Show performance in 2001.
  • She was pranked by her “Crossroads” co-star Anson mount. Before their big on-screen kiss, she ate a spoon full of garlic to disgust Britney.
  • The reason that Justin Timberlake gave for breaking up with Britney Spears was that she had cheated on him. The model in his music video ‘Cry me a river’ has a striking resemblance to Britney. Although the reason for break-up has not been confirmed.
  • Britney Spears was sued by her ‘bodyguard’ accusing her of sexual harassment in 2010 and the case was settled out of the court in 2012.

Facts about Britney Spears

  • Britney, along with Justin Timberlake, Christina Aguilera, Ryan Gosling, and actress Keri Russell appeared on Children’s Variety show for two seasons.
  • She gained popularity with the song ‘Baby One more time’ in 1999, which was originally intended for TLC.
  • The role Daisy Duke in Dukes of Hazzard was initially supposed to play Britney Spears, which eventually went to Jessica Simpson.
  • Britney’s line of fragrances is so important that they make a lion’s share of 34% in the Celebrity Perfume Market.

  • In her fourth album In the Zone, she took the charge for creative control and feature the globally successful number Toxic.

  • Her voice type is a soprano.
  • She has been lucky that her houses didn’t catch fire when her carelessness had almost left no chances.

  • She bought a bed that her psychic said belonged to Britney in her past birth when she was a princess of the British Empire. The coincidence is that her Grandmother is British.
  • Britney acted in Broadway before she made it big in the music industry and also was an understudy with Natalie Portman for an off-broadway show Ruthless!.

]]> Sushmita Sen is an Indian film actress and model. Furthermore, at the age of 18, she crowned Femina Miss India in 1994 and Miss Universe 1994. In addition, she is the first Indian woman to win the competition. She also works in many Hindi, Tamil and Bengali movies.

Biography & Wiki

Sushmita Sen’s nicknames are Sush and Titu. She was born on 19 November 1975 in Hyderabad, Telangana, India in a Hindu Bengali family. Hence, her current age is 44 years. Sushmita’s Zodiac is Scorpio.

Family Members

She is also a Graduate in English Honors and Journalism.

Sushmita Sen filmography

In 1994, as a teenager, Sen participated in the Femina Miss India contest. She won the title ‘Femina Miss India Universe‘, earning the right to compete at the Miss Universe 1994 contest. At the Miss Universe contest, Susmita ranked third overall in the preliminaries, behind Miss Colombia Carolina Gómez and Miss Venezuela Minorka Mercado. Sen went on to place second, fifth and third in the subsequent rounds and finally won the title and crown of Miss Universe 1994. She was the first Indian to win the title.

In 1996, Sushmita Sen started made her acting debut through Dastak. After that, she has been featured in many films such as Sirf Tum (1999), Biwi No. 1. Also, In 1999 Biwi no. 1 was the second-highest-grossing movie.

In 2000 she received critical acclaim and box office success for the film Aankhen, starring opposite Arjun Rampal. The film co-starred Amitabh Bachchan, Akshay Kumar, Aditya Pancholi, and Paresh Rawal. So far, her biggest hit has been the 2004 movie Main Hoon Na, in which she starred as Shahrukh Khan’s love interest. Moreover, the film grossed a total of Rs 330,000,000 and was the second best selling movie of that year.

In 2015, she starred in a Bengali drama film titled Nirbaak.

  • Siddharth made his debut in Bollywood in 2014 by playing the role of ‘Angad Bedi’ in the film “Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania.” His performance was appreciated in the film.
  • He has hosted the TV shows like “Savdhaan India” and “India’s Got Talent 7.”
  • In 2016, Shukla became the winner of the stunt-based show “Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi 7.”
  • In 2019, he entered the game reality show “Bigg Boss 13” as a contestant. Click here to check the complete list of Bigg Boss 13 contestants.
  • Siddharth keeps himself updated by reading newspapers and magazines.
  • He has a keen interest in politics.
  • During an interview, Siddharth revealed that he was an introvert and didn’t like partying.
  • He is very particular about his fitness and visits the gym regularly.
  • In January 2014, Siddharth apparently signed a 3-film contract with Karan Johar‘s production house, Dharma Productions.
  • In 2015, he won the Best Model of the World title at a contest held in Turkey. He was the first Asian man to do so.
  • Siddharth Shukla is a good friend of the Bollywood actor, John Abraham, since his modeling days.
